channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Running and maintaining complex web infrastructures with Ruby and Bosh"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Running and maintaining complex web infrastructures with Ruby and Bosh"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: Vassilis: You hit the nail on the head. It's about the deployment tool that makes it possible to manage a beast like CF.

item.title: Suggestion from Vassilis Rizopoulos (@)
item.description: No, he means the Cloudfoundry tools used for deployment and large scale release management. Pretty impressive beast I must say.

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: What's Bosh? You mean this http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0124.html or something else?
